about_the_game:
This is the key to the other world. It allows you to experience the world that only God knows. Take the key, my friend, and open the door to a new world.
DLC includes:
1. The game adds a CG review function;
2. Add five new female character plots;
3. Add plot unlocking function (get the number of stars through each level)
*You need to have purchased the base game to experience this DLC

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are adults, and all character names and plots appearing in the game are fictional and have nothing to do with reality.
The game DLC contains a large number of adult pornographic elements, including non-forced sex, forced sex, SM sex, foot sex, oral sex, etc.
The game's DLC contains a large number of adult explicit sexual intercourse scenes, and the plot includes alcohol abuse, etc.
All religious scenes included in the game DLC are fictional scenes and have no connection with reality.
When playing this game, please pay attention to the surrounding environment and do not play this game in public places.

detailed_description:
This is the key to the other world. It allows you to experience the world that only God knows. Take the key, my friend, and open the door to a new world.
DLC includes:
1. The game adds a CG review function;
2. Add five new female character plots;
3. Add plot unlocking function (get the number of stars through each level)
*You need to have purchased the base game to experience this DLC
name: Goblin's R18 additional content package -DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: This is a key to the other world. It allows you to experience the world that only God knows. Take the key, my friend, and open the door to a new world.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
